RequirementsÔÉÅ

  1. Three input channels for search coil magnetometer

  2. Analog Devices AD4030-24 ADC. One ADC/channel.

  3. Reference voltage is 4.096 V.

  4. Input voltage range -Vref to +Vref

    1. Differential input with 2.5 V common mode.

    2. Input range IN+ to GND: 452 mV to 4.55 V

    3. Input range IN- to GND: 452 mV to 4.55 V

  5. Sampling rate 2^17 Hz. The underlying sampling rate of the datalogger is 2^20 Hz. The reduction to 2^17 Hz is done by a block filter inside of the ADC.

  6. Analog frequency range to be controlled by amtenna section.

  7. Power delivery to analog board:

    1. +- 9 V with a minimum on 30 mA on each rail.

    2. Ripple: TBD

    3. Noise: Wide bandwidth noise must be filtered out.
